YOUR LOCAL
HIDEAWAY HANGOUT
Overlooking beautiful St. Andrews Bay, Papa Joe's Bayside is Panama City's new little piece of paradise.
CHECK US OUT
WE OFFER
FOOD TRUCKS
Check the calendar below for our weekly lineup of local food trucks or visit our Facebook and Instagram pages. As always, our Papa Joe's food truck will be parked Bayside offering yummy coastal creations.
FULL BAR
Tequila Joe's offers your favorite, thirst-quenching booze from our mobile truck. We kindly ask that you please leave your coolers at home.
DOWN AT THE DOCK
Head down to the docks and check out our fleet of pontoon boats. Offering full-day and half-day rentals at competitive pricing, Papa Joe's Pontoons is the best way to get on Island time. Or schedue your next fishing trip with our inshore charter company, located down at Papa Joe's dock.
LIVE ENTERTAINMENT
There's no better place to listen to great beats than by the bay. Live music offered seasonally. Check our Social Media pages for our weekly lineup of artists.
VIEWS
Looking for somewhere to escape? Grab your family, friends, pups, or whoever and enjoy a day by the water at Papa Joe's. You can even come by boat! Just make sure you stay until sunset!
PICKLEBALL
Get ready to serve, rally, and smash at our brand-new pickleball courts located right on the bay! Weâ€™ve added four state-of-the-art courts to our outdoor venue, perfect for players of all skill levels. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just learning the game, Papa Joeâ€™s Pickleball offers a fun, competitive environment paired with stunning bay views and access to food and beverages.
Introducing Papa Joe's Pickleball at Papa Joe's Bayside!
Pickleball
Get ready to serve, rally, and smash at our brand-new pickleball courts located right on the bay! Weâ€™ve added four state-of-the-art courts to our outdoor venue, perfect for players of all skill levels. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just learning the game, Papa Joeâ€™s Pickleball offers a fun, competitive environment paired with stunning bay views and access to food and beverages. Choose from daily guest fees or join with one of our membership options to make the most of your experience. Enjoy tournaments, clinics, and casual games as we build a vibrant, welcoming pickleball community at Papa Joeâ€™s Bayside. Come play and be part of the action! We are currently open for 2-hour Open Play sessions!

Operated by Salty Pontoons
Explore the Bay with Papa Joeâ€™s Pontoons
We're excited to announce that while pontoon boat rentals continue to be a highlight at Papa Joeâ€™s Bayside, they are now proudly operated by Salty Pontoons. Enjoy the same great location with the added expertise and service of Salty Pontoons to enhance your on-water experience.
THE KNITTY GRITTY
READ BEFORE BOOKING
OUR PONTOONS
We offer quality, clean, and affordable pontoon boats that come equipped with either a 40 HP, 60HP, or 90 HP motor, Bluetooth radio, swim ladders, and life jackets. We have boats that can accommodate 8 and 12 passengers.
HOW TO BOOK
Click on the book now below above or call (850) 695 - 1958. We offer both half-day (4.5 Hours), and full-day (9 Hours) rentals depending on the length of time you'd like to occupy the boat.
SAFETY FIRST
All vessel operators are required to be at least 18 YEARS OF AGE with a valid ID. All renters born ON OR AFTER JANUARY 1, 1988 MUST HAVE a Florida boaters license or boaters safety card. Pontoon boats are about the safest vessels out there to operate, especially for newbies who have never driven a boat. Youâ€™ll find our pontoons offer a smooth and safe ride for the whole family. All boats come equipped with USGC safety equipment and life jackets.
INCLEMENT WEATHER WOES
We are known as the sunshine state but we understand the occasional thunderstorm can pop up and cut your trip short. If the weatherman is predicting bad weather we ask that you call at least 24 hours in advance to receive a full refund.
BOOK A PONTOON RENTAL HERE
Grand-MÃ©re Shell Island Cruises
Operated by AAA Jet Skis
Jet Ski Adventures Await!
Experience the thrill of the waves with AAA Jet Ski's, now bookable right here through Papa Joeâ€™s Bayside. While we host a variety of activities, please note that the jet ski rentals are conveniently located just down the road from us, on the west side of the port at the foot of the bridge at 5611 US-98 SUITE 1, PANAMA CITY, FL 32401. Itâ€™s a quick trip to where your water adventure begins! AAA Jet Skiâ€™s is the only jet ski company that offers dolphin tours with guided and unguided ride time. If you are familiar with our waterways and have jet ski experience, we also offer unguided jet ski rentals! View our rates and tour information below.
2-HOUR SHELL ISLAND DOLPHIN TOUR
Visit Shell Island and swim with the Dolphins!
$139 â€“ 9:00am tour
$149 â€“ 11:30, 2:00, and 4:30 tour
Two guests per jet ski,Â with a max weight of 350 LBS
This tour is a moderate to medium-paced tour. Follow your AAA Jet Ski guide from the tranquil waters of St. Andrew Bay into the emerald green waters of the Gulf of Mexico as you see bottle-nosed Dolphins. The guided portion of the Shell Island tour is approximately one hour, the remaining time is yours to explore at your own pace without the guide or group. At the conclusion of the tour, the group will gather and ride back together. Â You are required to bring a phone to keep up with your time. The guide will instruct you when to return so that the group can make it back to the marina on time. You may also bring water or aÂ sports drink with you.
UNGUIDED JET SKI RENTALS
Explore Shell Island on a jet ski in Panama City Beach, no guide required! Cruise the Gulf around the island or drop anchor and snorkel secluded areas of Shell Island Beach! AAA Jet Ski provides a map of our area and then your on your way to explore the waterways. Unguided rentals can be booked over the phone.
One Hour RentalÂ $125
Two Hour Rental:Â $199
Half Day Rental:Â $349
Full Day Rental:Â $549
BOOK A JET SKI HERE
GUIDED FISHING TRIPS
FISHING CHARTERS
Heading out on the water? Let an experienced and locally owned inshore fishing guide take you. Departing and returning from our private dock, Panama City Inshore knows all the best local spots. Book your next fishing trip by checking out their site below.
PANAMA CITY INSHORE
